content: mc = main color fur cc = coordinating color nose tail etc for each ear cc chain 14 decrease until end of row stitch along one long side and cinch for each front leg cc chain eight fold in half sew along fold for each back leg cc chain 16 single_crochet 8 fold in half sew along fold for tail cc chain 80 or make a round braid about 18 inches long cc chain 3 and join in round - total 3 mc single_crochet 2 in each - total 6 mark first stitch single_crochet 2 in each for next 3 stitches then single_crochet to end of round - total 9 single_crochet 2 in each for next 6 stitches then single_crochet to end of round - total 15 single_crochet to end of round repeat for 3 rounds- total 15 single_crochet 12 single_crochet 3 in each for next 3 stitches - total 21 attach eyes single_crochet for 4 rounds - total 21 add ears see earlier note on making them single_crochet for 1 round - total 21 stuff head decrease until can tie off head is now complete single_crochet in each stitch as before the decreases began place stitch marker between the ears make that stitch one - total 21 single_crochet for 2 rounds - total 21 single_crochet 7 single_crochet 2 in each for next 7 stitches single_crochet 7 - total 28 single_crochet 7 single_crochet 2 in each for next 14 stitches single_crochet 7 - total 42 single_crochet 14 attach front leg as shown earlier single_crochet 14 attach front leg single_crochet 14 - total 42 single_crochet for 1 round - total 42 single_crochet 7 decrease 14 single_crochet 7 - total 28 single_crochet for 4 rounds - total 28 single_crochet 7 decrease 7 single_crochet 7 - total 21 single_crochet for 2 rounds - total 21 single_crochet 7 single_crochet 2 in each for next 7 stitches single_crochet 7 - total 28 single_crochet 7 single_crochet 2 in each for next 14 stitches single_crochet 7 - total 42 single_crochet 14 attach back leg single_crochet 14 attach back leg single_crochet 14 - total 42 single_crochet for 1 round - total 42 single_crochet 14 decrease 7 single_crochet 14 - total 35 single_crochet for 4 rounds - total 35 thread tail see instruction for making it earlier through every other stitch tie into loop weave in ends
